name: Thaumaturgy
description:
You manifest a minor wonder within range. You create one of the effects below within range. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time.
<bi> Altered Eyes. <r> You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.
<bi> Booming Voice. <r> Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. For the duration, you have Advantage on Charisma (Intimidation) checks.
<bi> Fire Play. <r> You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.
<bi> Invisible Hand. <r> You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.
<bi> Phantom Sound. <r> You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.
<bi> Tremors. <r> You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.
